text:
These Inside Pictures From Priyanka-Nick's Jodhpur Wedding Are Absolutely Surreal And Precious
These Inside Pictures From Priyanka-Nick's Jodhpur Wedding Are Absolutely Surreal And Precious
2018 was a year of magical celebrity weddings. A lot of our favorite couples took a leap of faith and gave their love story a beautiful turn by exchanging vows. Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas too took the plunge and their destination wedding in Jodhpur was everything that one could only dream of.
The Chopra and the Jonas family came together for a blissful union of two lovebirds and the pictures and videos that managed to resurface online proved that it was indeed a fairytale wedding.
Even though it's been more than a month since they got married, the pictures are being shared by a few of their friends and wedding guests and they are all perfect.
Don't Miss 518 SHARES 132 SHARES 291 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES
In case you too are suffering from major #Nickyanka wedding Fomo, let these pictures give you another closer glimpse of the epic wedding that was!
title: These Inside Pictures From Priyanka-Nick's Jodhpur Wedding Are Absolutely Surreal And Precious
description: 2018 was a year of magical celebrity weddings. A lot of our favorite couples took a leap of faith and gave their love story a beautiful turn by exchanging vows. Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas too took the plunge and their destination wedding in Udaipur was everything that one could only dream of.
